column3: News;A French building collapsed near Pubstreet
column4: Old Market in Siem Reap province
column5: at least five people injured or missing------September 16
column6: 2018 7:11 AM------Siem Reap: A building close to Pubstreet
column16: said that workers were trapped in the collapse of the building
column17: and four were taken to hospital and one was still under the rubble. Tools are being used to dig through to find the missing person.------More details later!
